kDesc
Winter cloak (black, silver fastenings) with Gryffindor striped tie. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]

Wintermantel (schwarz, Silberverschlüsse) mit gestreifter Gryffindor-Krawatte. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
Mantello invernale (nero con chiusure argentate) con cravatta di Grifondoro a strisce. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
Capa de invierno (negra, con cierres de plata) con corbata a rayas de Gryffindor. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
